thread.title_full: WATCH: Pro-Palestinian protesters interrupt Israel envoy's Columbia speech - Arab-Israeli Conflict - Jerusalem Post

title: WATCH: Pro-Palestinian protesters interrupt Israel envoy's Columbia speech - Arab-Israeli Conflict - Jerusalem Post
text: "Danny Danon you can't hide, we charge you with genocide," they chanted as waitlisted guests for Danon's event stood in line, several bearing Israeli flags. Anti Israel protest outside @dannydanon talk at @Columbia . Chanting for destruction of Jewish state. pic.twitter.com/EBz6JrYcaB — Lea Speyer (@LeaRSpeyer) February 14, 2017 In addition, a group of chanting protesters interrupted the student event during which Danon addressed the crowd on Israel."We'll be free from the river to the sea, Palestine!" shouted a handful of demonstrators marching up stair in the lecture hall. These people don't recognize Israel's Right to exist. Jerusalem is the eternal capital of Israel and that is not going to change. pic.twitter.com/1967N2shqK — Ambassador Danon (@dannydanon) February 14, 2017 This is how hate and incitement looks like. pic.twitter.com/9WJDa4vvwE — Ambassador Danon (@dannydanon) February 14, 2017 The Israeli envoy later took to Twitter to condemn the disruptive protests."We'll not be silenced when people are spreading lies about Israel," he wrote. "Israel will continue to be a strong democracy, the only one in the M.E. [Middle East]." Relevant to your professional network? Please share on Linkedin Tags:
